gololang.concurrent.async

Class AssignedFuture

  • java.lang.Object
    • gololang.concurrent.async.AssignedFuture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future

    public final class AssignedFuture
extends java.lang.Object
implements Future
    Convenience implementation for pre-set futures.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gololang.concurrent.async.Future

      • onSet

        public Future onSet(Future.Observer observer)
        Description copied from interface: Future
